an3.6:4.1: “A fool is known by three things.
an3.6:4.3: Unwholesome deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.6:4.4: These are the three things by which a fool is known.
an3.6:5.1: An astute person is known by three things.
an3.6:5.3: Wholesome deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.6:5.4: These are the three things by which an astute person is known.
